start.title: Home
start.header: Appeal an immigration or asylum decision
start.description: We need to ask you a few questions to start your appeal.
requirements: create an account if you haven't already got one
have your Home Office decision letter with you

homeOfficeDetails.htmlLink: Your Home Office details

personalDetails.htmlLink: Your personal details

contactDetails.htmlLink: Your contact details

typeOfAppeal.htmlLink: Type of appeal

checkAndSend.htmlLink: Check and send your appeal

appealType.header: What type of appeal will you make?
pageHint: Select at least one of the options below
You can change this at a later date
appealType.errorMessage: You must select at least one option

protection.name: Protection
protection.description: You will be persecuted or harmed in some way if you are removed from the UK

humanRights.name: Human Rights
humanRights.description: You have a family and/or private life in the UK, or a serious medical condition

eea.name: European Economic Area (EEA)
eea.description: You are, or a family member is, an EEA/Swiss national

revocation.name: Revocation of Protection Status
revocation.description: Your protection status was taken away

deprivation.name: Deprivation of Citizenship
deprivation.description: Your British citizenship was taken way

DOB.heading: What is your date of birth?
DOB.title: Date of Birth

nationality.heading: What is your nationality?
nationality.title: Nationality
nationality.stateless: I am stateless (A stateless person is not a citizen of any country).

error404.title: Page not found
error404.webAddress: If you typed the web address, check it is correct.
error404.pasted: If you pasted the web address, check you copied the entire address.
error404.link: If the web address is correct or you selected a link or button

error500.title: Service unavailable
error500.header: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
error500.savedAnswers: We saved your answers. They will be available for 30 days.

cookieBanner.content: GOV.UK uses cookies to make the site simpler. Find out more about cookies

homeOfficePage.title: What is your Home Office reference number?
homeOfficePage.description: You can find this on the top right-hand side of the decision letter.

homeOfficeLetterSent.title: What date was the letter sent?
homeOfficeLetterSent.description: You can usually find this stamped on the envelope of the decision letter. If you don't have the envelope, you can enter the date on the first page of the decision letter.

validationErrors.homeOfficeRef: The Home Office Number is not correct. Please review it.
validationErrors.atLeastOneOption: You must select at least one option
